comment_data.body:
Just a guess, but `require('lspconfig').phpactor.setup` makes me wonder if you're also using the new `vim.lsp.config('...')` approach, in which case two servers will start.

`require('lspconfig').phpactor.setup` is deprecated and not supported, as the README in this repo clearly mentions. The docs in this repo also clearly mention that this is not a support forum.

title: Starting multiple instances of LSP
